experiences.description: Mentoring over 50+ students (age 9–16) in core computer science fundamentals including Python and JavaScript. Design personalized lesson plans to accommodate diverse learning styles. Conduct interactive coding sessions, debug live with students, and build mini-projects to reinforce logic building. Leverage performance analytics to track student progress and offer targeted improvement plans. Actively contribute to curriculum design and parent-mentor feedback loops to ensure academic growth and satisfaction

Spearhead a team of 10+ student writers and editors to produce alumni-centric content including newsletters, event coverage, and feature interviews. Revamped the editorial workflow to cut content production time by 30%. Regularly collaborate with alumni for testimonials and success stories, strengthening alumni-university ties. Mentored junior writers in storytelling and journalistic ethics. Initiated a monthly alumni spotlight series which improved engagement metrics by 45%

Conceptualized and developed the Virtual Braj Museum—a culturally immersive web app that brings the heritage of the Braj region to life using VR. Engineered 3D interactive maps and 360° panoramic experiences with Threejs. Optimized app performance using lazy loading and modular architecture. Coordinated with historians to preserve cultural fidelity in all digital representations. Followed Agile methodologies with weekly sprints and SDLC documentation

Assisted in executing digital campaigns that reached 10,000+ potential leads. Conducted in-depth market research to identify high-conversion segments. Contributed to CRM automation workflows using tools like HubSpot, improving lead nurturing efficiency. Designed social media content that boosted engagement by 25% within a month. Participated in cross-functional meetings to align sales strategy with marketing initiatives, providing data-driven insights for better decision-making

mixed.description: Led front-end and back-end development for AI-enhanced productivity tools in a fast-paced startup environment. Developed reusable UI components using Next.js and managed state efficiently with Redux. Created and consumed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Nestjs, improving response latency by 20%. Partnered with UX teams to streamline user flows and wireframes for tools used by 1,000+ beta users. Enforced best practices in version control (Git/GitHub) and code review. Deployed features on cloud infrastructure with CI/CD integration.

projects.name: Stuti
projects.description: Stuti is an agile, voice-controlled assistive AI agent tailored for Gantavya’s daily operational workflows. It streamlines productivity by executing contextual voice commands, managing calendar events, automating repetitive tasks, and enabling multimodal interaction via speech and text. Built using modern NLP techniques, it enhances accessibility and allows seamless control over digital tools in real-time environments.

projects.name: Trade It Up
projects.description: Trade It Up is a real-time web trading platform built for high-end antique and collectible markets. It features live bidding through WebSockets, ownership verification via blockchain smart contracts, and dynamic price tracking for rare assets. The platform integrates an escrow mechanism for secure transactions and offers a seamless UX for elite collectors to trade in a trusted environment.

projects.name: Virtual Braj Museum
projects.description: Virtual Braj Museum is a 360° VR-powered digital museum that immerses users in the cultural, historical, and spiritual richness of the Braj region. It features interactive maps, panoramic galleries, and a timeline of heritage events. Optimized with lazy loading for smooth performance, the platform is accessible across desktop, mobile, and VR devices—bridging the gap between technology and tradition.

projects.name: Braj Estate
projects.description: Braj Estate is a modern real-estate web application tailored for the Braj region, allowing users to BUY, SELL, and RENT properties with ease. It supports dynamic listing management, real-time inquiry tracking, map-based filters, and a minimal UI designed for accessibility and fast navigation. Built with a mobile-first approach and clean architectural design.

projects.name: Style Sync
projects.description: A smart style advisor that recommends outfits based on body type and personality, combines fashion data analysis with preference learning to build personalized styling experiences

projects.name: Python Mastery
projects.description: A comprehensive 120-day roadmap to master Python from beginner to advanced levels. This course features hand-curated learning paths, over 50 real-world projects, and chatbot development tutorials using Flask. Designed to accelerate Python learning through hands-on practice and conceptual clarity, it serves as a complete self-paced guide for aspiring developers and automation enthusiasts.

projects.name: OOPs its DSA
projects.description: A structured Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA) and interview prep series that includes a topic-wise tracksheet, curated questions, and 200+ LeetCode problems. Solutions are implemented in C, C++, Java, Python, TypeScript, and C#, offering multi-language versatility. Ideal for students preparing for tech interviews, coding rounds, or mastering problem-solving techniques.

projects.name: D Web Tech
projects.description: D Web Tech is an all-in-one, 365-day self-learning program covering web development from fundamentals to advanced full-stack and deployment. The curriculum spans HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MERN stack, REST APIs, database management, DevOps pipelines, cloud deployment, and AI integration—empowering learners to build scalable, production-grade web applications.
